__e: At your orders. "Into your hands, I commend his spirit to the eternal repose of his soul.

And again, this blood is only a drop, flowing by in the eternal stream of the life of your people, whom you owe everything, and whose source of origin therefore is the deepest and highest you can subserviently bow to in childlike awe.
I would like to offer my own tomb as your son's final place of rest.
He woke in the middle of the night, pictured eternity, lay there in a cold sweat, and has not been able to get back to sleep since.
And make me feel like something was gonna last, and you need that.
and no matter how much they talked to me about salvation, I wanted something else.
